LanguageData.Ratkin.label: Ratkin
LanguageData.Ratkin.description:
A humanoid race with rodent genes, readily identified by their large, round ears and thin, scaly tails.

While their origins are unknown, most Ratkin societies are generally organized around agricultural monarchies, although a small number of individual Ratkins have been observed seeking employment in predominantly-human cities.

Females typically outnumber males at a ratio of 9 to 1, but it is often difficult to determine a Ratkin's gender from their outward appearance.
LanguageData.Ratkin.tools.0.label: teeth
LanguageData.Ratkin.tools.1.label: left fist
LanguageData.Ratkin.tools.2.label: right fist
